name: pixelBOT EXTREME!
description: EXTREME! multitasking RUN and GUN with a colorful twist! Team up with pixelBOT, shoot up everything in your way and master a unique color-based destruction! Show what you've got and help the BOT breaking out of the Forbidden Factory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
